title: Foxworth Friday: Parallels between Aaron Rodgers and Novak Djokovic
description:
Bomani Jones and Domonique Foxworth discuss the parallels between Packers QB Aaron Rodgers (1:18) and Serbian tennis star Novak Djokovic (19:34) in each of their public stances against taking the COVID-19 vaccine.
